description.lang: l Fully complaint to Z-Wave command class.l Built-in AC IR code library with Configuration Learning capability. l Able to feedback room temperature.l Build-in 5 direction IR emitters(hemispherical coverage),l 3.5mm jack for external wired IR emitter (optional).l Transmit IR control code with a wide range of carrier frequency (15 to 455kHz).l Programmable power level (LOW or HIGH) for external IR emitter to avoid saturation of IR receivers.l Dual mode (FLiRS mode when working on battery, Always Listening mode when work on AC power)l Frequency: US: 908.4MHz,EU:868.4MHz, AU:921.4MHzl Power Source: USB mini-B,5V DC Jack, or 3xAAA batteries.l Dismountable battery box.l Dimension: Extender unit: 70mm (diameter) *18mm(thickness)l Battery Box: 70mm(diameter) *15.5mm(thickness)
